summary: Take a walk on the scary side with guerrilla horror filmmakers and the bizarre culture that drives them to pursue their dreams. In 2003, filmmaker Christopher P. Garetano began what would ... See full summary »
cast: Ray Adell|Mark Borchardt|Ron Atkins|Ken Keen|Anthony Timpone|John Goras|Dave Parker|David Stagnari|Tate Steinsiek|John Brodie|Rodrigo Gudiño|Brian Singleton|John Bloom|David Gebroe|Christina Reilly|Alicia Torres|Jennifer Atkins|Sherrie Beaupre|Monica Borchardt|Suzanne Borchardt|Marilyn Burns|Tracy Coogan|Tonya Cornelisse|Robert Englund|John Giancaspro|Andrew Gore|Sid Haig|Gunnar Hansen|Olga Karlatos|Lloyd Kaufman|Terry King|Steven Krause|Stanley Kubrick|Michael Lally|Ryan Lally|Garvin Lee|Herschell Gordon Lewis|Bela Lugosi|Caitlyn Mihnovich|Dan Resha|Mike Schank|Rod Serling|Graham Sibley|Hank Steele|Orson Welles|Dan Brezgel
title: Horror Business
